page.title: 17A CASTLETOWN SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: My name is Trevor MacLeod.At 8.10 am I get up,dress and have a breakfast of Frosties and milk.At 8.45 am I set off for school on my bike.School starts at 9.15 am.First we hand in our homework and then we do some English.We have playtime at 10.40 am when the boys usually play football.After playtime we do Four Rules of Decimals followed by Maths.At 12.50 pm we stop for lunch.I take a school lunch which may be fish and chips and jelly and ice cream.Then we have playtime until 1.55 pm when we do Project or Art work until 3.30 pm when we go home.At home I make the fire and then play on the computer until dinner.After dinner I go down the street to play with my pals but only on a dry night.We usually play football or else we play on our BMX bikes.Then I go home,have supper and go to bed at 10.00 pm.
